issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: Post support of additional resource types other then CPU and Memory, it could be possible that one such new resource is exhausted its quota on a given queue. But other resources such as Memory / CPU is still there beyond its guaranteed limit (under max-limit).Â Adding more units test to ensure we are not starving such allocation requests
fields.summary: Additional Unit  tests to verify queue limit and max-limit with multiple resource types
